name: Repair the spacecraft
description:
`´The Spacecraft finally returns to its home planet after a long mission. But what´s this, someone stole the energy cores to power the ship while the crew was in cryosleep and now they can´t wake up. Now only the Robots can fix the ship.

Credits:

Camera Movenment script: Nils

Rest: Me

I dindn`t have much time this week so I couldn´t add a lot of polish, mabey i´ll update it later

You´re welcome to leave a comment on what i could do better.
